SAXNotSupportedException().Description: Construct a new exception with no message.

Parameters: String: The text message of the exception.
SAXNotSupportedException(java.lang.Strin.Description: Construct a new exception with the given message.

ClassDesc: Exception class for an unsupported operation. An XMLReader will throw this exception when it recognizes a feature or property identifier, but cannot perform the requested operation (setting a state or value). Other SAX2 applications and extensions may use this class for similar purposes.
